mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO sys_role_dept(role_id, dept_id) VALUES (#{roleId}, #{deptId})
mapper.select:
SELECT dept.* FROM sys_dept AS dept
INNER JOIN sys_role_dept AS rd ON rd.dept_id = dept.id
WHERE
rd.role_id = #{roleId}
dept.id NOT IN ( SELECT rd.dept_id FROM sys_role_dept AS rd WHERE rd.role_id = #{roleId} )
AND LOCATE(#{condition.name}, dept.name) > 0
ORDER BY dept.sort ASC
